title: British Minister expresses his support and sympathy on flooding in Sri Lanka
content: Onlanka News – By Janaka Alahapperuma from London British Foreign and Commonwealth Office Minister Alistair Burt has expressed his support on the flooding in Sri Lanka in a message issued on the 14 January. Minister Burt further extended his sympathy to all those who have suffered as a result of the rains. Minister made these…
